visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object that renders a scatter plot with the title 'Time mapping'. The chart should have a subtitle 'Points are played from bottom of y-axis and up'. The data series should include points with specific coordinates and a custom color. The chart should have a sonification feature enabled, mapping time to Y values. The legend should be disabled, and the tooltip should display the coordinates of each point. The chart should also include a button to toggle the sonification feature.

subtitle.text: Points are played from bottom of y-axis and up

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a scatter plot with a title 'Time mapping' and a subtitle explaining the sonification feature. The chart type is set to 'scatter', and the data series includes specific points with coordinates and a custom color. The sonification feature is enabled, mapping time to the Y values of the points, with a duration of 4000 milliseconds. The legend is disabled, and the tooltip displays the coordinates of each point. The chart also includes a button to toggle the sonification feature, enhancing user interaction with the chart.
